translations: 内切的；记名的；有铭刻的
题写；雕刻；内切（inscribe 的过去分词）

sentences.sentence: His name was inscribed on the trophy.
The trophy was inscribed with his name.
The falling water level denoted the passing hour as it dipped below hour lines inscribed on the inner surface.
sentences.translation: 当下降的水位低于内表面刻下的小时线，表示经过了多少时间。
